results.text: You are thrown up to 30 ft. to be adjacent to as many hostile creatures as possible. If there are no hostile creatures within range, you are slammed into the ground, taking 4d6 bludgeoning damage.
You trip, take 2d6 bludgeoning damage, and fall prone. Your turn ends as soon as your spell is resolved.
Your mind suddenly clears. If you were concentrating or affected by the charmed, confused, frightened, or goaded conditions, you lose concentration and those conditions immediately end.
You teleport 5d10 ft. in a random direction. If this would land you in a solid object or somewhere that would cause you to immediately take damage, you are instead placed in the nearest safe space.
A miniature sheep appears on your head and happily keeps your ears warm. After 1 hour, it unravels into yarn.
A creature of your choice within 60 ft. must make a wisdom save or fall prone and forget how to stand up for 1 round.
You sneeze out a multicolored globule of sand. You feel renewed. You regain 6d6 hit points.
You bend space around a point in a 20 ft. radius for 1 minute. Anyone moving in the area spends only 5 ft. of movement for every 10 ft. travelled.
Choose three creatures within 90 ft. other than yourself. Targets immediately swallow sweet syrup and regain one 1st level spell slot, if they can.
You can choose an injured creature within 60 ft. That creature must make a constitution save or be drained by as many hit points as they're missing.

You feel connected to the collective humanoid hive mind. If you or one of your allies within 60 ft. are concentrating on a spell, you can transfer concentration and control of the spell to yourself or a willing ally within 60 ft.

You conjure a painted egg the size of a medium creature with 10 hit points and 13 AC. If you (and only you) reduce the egg to 0 hit points it in the next minute, the egg casts a spell you know of 3rd level or lower, following your guidance for how and where to cast the spell.
You gain a swim speed of 20 or your swim speed increases by 20. For 1 minute, you can fly by swimming in the air.
A choir accompanies your spell. You and all allies within 30 ft. gain 2d12 temporary hit points.

You shoot burning beams of light from your eyes at a creature you can see within 90 ft. The target and all creatures between you and the target must make a dexterity save or take 2d10 radiant damage, or half as much on a save.

You immediately jump up to 200 ft. in any direction without expending any movement or taking fall damage. If you travel more than 200 ft. total (including falling) you teleport back to your point of origin.
You regain 6 sorcery points. If you go above your maximum and don't spend the excess points, your sorcery point total will be lowered to your maximum after 1 minute.
After casting your spell, you can choose to immediately grant a creature within 30 ft. (including yourself) the benefits of the Mirror Image spell without you requiring to concentrate on it.
Any metamagic options you apply to this spell are free.
Wild Surge Table Lv. 7
